page.title: 09BOW CLUBS AND ORGANISATIONS
page.content: {THE MOTHER AND TODDLER GROUP}meet on Thursday afternoons in the Village Hall.{VILLAGE HALL COMMITTEE} meet monthly.They raise funds for the upkeep of the hall and for the completion of the driveway.{VILLAGE {FIELD COMMITTEE} meet when necessary and they are re_siting the adventure playground this year.{THE PARISH {COUNCIL}is directly responsible to the District Council.They meet every six weeks in the Community Room.They have a chairman and eight councillors. {THE PAROCHIAL CHURCH COUNCIL}meet 4 times a year in the Church Room and they conduct the business of the Church.{CHARITABLE GROUPS}both Mothers Union and Womens Institute raise money for Charities both here and overseas.Two members of the community raise funds for Cystic Fibrosis and British Heart Foundation.
